InstructionData.Title: t2
InstructionData.Author: Renrek
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias sorter d0 alias dial d1 alias stacker d2 alias display d3
alias dialSetting r1 alias leverStatus r2 alias oreType r3 alias inputOre r4 s sorter Mode 2 main:
l dialSetting dial Setting beqz dialSetting main jal getSetting s display Setting oreType #s display Setting oreType #s display Setting oreType #l leverStatus silo Open #beq leverStatus OFF main ls inputOre sorter 0 OccupantHash #l r1 Sorter Output # s db Setting r0 # Set WhiteList bne inputOre oreType sendBack s sorter Output 1 j main
sendBack: s sorter Output 0
j main
getSetting: beq dialSetting 1 ice beq dialSetting 2 volatiles beq dialSetting 3 oxite beq dialSetting 4 coal beq dialSetting 5 copper beq dialSetting 6 iron beq dialSetting 7 nickel beq dialSetting 8 silicon beq dialSetting 9 uranium beq dialSetting 10 cobalt beq dialSetting 11 gold beq dialSetting 12 lead beq dialSetting 13 silver
j main
ice: move oreType 1217489948 j ra
volatiles: move oreType 1253102035 j ra
oxite: move oreType -1805394113 j ra
coal: move oreType 1724793494 j ra
copper: move oreType -707307845 j ra
iron: move oreType 1758427767 j ra
nickel: move oreType 1830218956 j ra
silicon: move oreType 1103972403 j ra
uranium: move oreType -1516581844 j ra
cobalt: move oreType -983091249 j ra
gold: move oreType -1348105509 j ra
lead: move oreType -190236170 j ra
silver: move oreType -916518678 j ra
